about.title: About Emoji Maker
about.intro: Emoji Maker is a fun project that lets you create custom emojis using AI. Ever wanted an emoji that perfectly captures your mood or idea? Now you can make it happen!

features.title: ‚ú® What Makes It Cool
features.description: We've combined the power of Stable Diffusion (SDXL) with a specialized emoji model to turn your text descriptions into unique, expressive emojis. Just type what you want, and watch the AI work its magic.

steps.2: Get your custom emoji in seconds

forCreators.title: üéØ Built For Creators
forCreators.description: Whether you're a developer, content creator, or just someone who loves emojis, we've got you covered. Every new user starts with free credits to create their first emojis.

community.title: ü§ù Community First
community.description: This isn't just a tool - it's a community of emoji enthusiasts. Like and share your favorite creations, get inspired by others, and be part of something fun!

products.title: Choose Your Plan
products.subtitle: Find the perfect plan for your emoji creation needs

free.question: What's included in the free plan?
free.answer: The free plan includes 3 emoji generations per month, basic customization options, and access to our community features.

upgrade.question: How do I upgrade to Pro?
upgrade.answer: You can upgrade to Pro at any time from your account settings. Pro features are instantly activated upon successful payment.

refund.question: What's your refund policy?
refund.answer: We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee for Pro subscriptions. No questions asked.

commercial.question: Can I use emojis commercially?
commercial.answer: Yes! Pro plan users get full commercial rights to all generated emojis.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Transform your ideas into expressive emojis with our AI-powered tools

aiGeneration.title: AI Emoji Generation
aiGeneration.description: Turn your ideas into custom emojis in seconds using our cutting-edge AI technology. Perfect for creating unique expressions.

customization.title: Style Customization
customization.description: Choose from various artistic styles, or create your own. Adjust colors, expressions, and details to match your brand.

sharing.title: Easy Sharing
sharing.description: Share your creations directly to social media or export them for use in your favorite messaging apps.

export.title: Batch Export
export.description: Download your emojis in multiple formats and sizes. Perfect for different platforms and use cases.

priority.title: Priority Processing
priority.description: Skip the queue with our Pro plan. Get faster generation times and priority support when you need it most.

license.title: Commercial License
license.description: Use your generated emojis in commercial projects with our Pro plan. Full rights included.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy | Emoji Maker
cookies.description: Learn about how we use cookies and similar technologies on Emoji Maker

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At Emoji Maker, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our AI-powered emoji creation service. By using our service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect the following types of information to provide and improve our service:

items.0: Account information (email, name, and profile picture) when you sign up
items.1: Usage data (emoji creations, interactions, and preferences)
items.2: Technical information (browser type, device info, and IP address)
items.3: Payment information when you upgrade to our Pro plan (processed securely through our payment provider)
items.4: Communications you have with our support team

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use your information for the following purposes:

items.0: To provide and maintain our service, including generating AI-powered emojis
items.1: To improve our service based on how you use it
items.2: To communicate with you about updates, support, and promotional offers
items.3: To detect and prevent fraud or abuse of our service

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We don't sell your personal information. We only share your information with third parties when necessary to provide our service (like with our AI provider Replicate), when required by law, or with your explicit consent.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information. This includes encryption, secure servers, and regular security audits. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to improve your experience on our site. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have several rights regarding your personal information:

items.0: Access and download your personal data
items.2: Delete your account and associated data

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at privacy@qianniuspace.com.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using Emoji Maker, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you may not access our service.

services.title: Description of Services
services.content: Emoji Maker provides an AI-powered platform for creating custom emojis. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of our service at any time.

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.content: When creating an account, you must:

items.1: Maintain the security of your account credentials
items.2: Promptly update any changes to your information
items.3: Accept responsibility for all activities under your account

content.title: User Content
content.content: You retain ownership of your content but grant us license to:

items.0: Use, display, and store your content
items.1: Modify content to provide our services
items.2: Share content according to your settings
items.3: Remove content that violates our policies

payment.title: Payment Terms
payment.content: Pro plan subscriptions are billed in advance on a monthly or annual basis. Refunds are handled according to our refund policy. Free credits and promotional offers may be subject to additional terms.

termination.title: Account Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate accounts that violate our terms, engage in fraudulent activity, or harm our community. You may delete your account at any time.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: Our service is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free service.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at terms@qianniuspace.com.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Cookie Policy explains how Emoji Maker uses cookies and similar technologies to recognize you when you visit our website. It explains what these technologies are and why we use them, as well as your rights to control our use of them.

what.title: What Are Cookies
what.content: Cookies are small data files placed on your device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide reporting information.

types.title: Types of Cookies We Use
types.content: We use the following types of cookies:

items.0: Essential cookies: Required for basic site functionality
items.1: Performance cookies: Help us understand how visitors use our site
items.3: Targeting cookies: Help make our advertising more relevant

control.title: Your Cookie Controls
control.content: Most browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. However, if you limit the ability of websites to set cookies, you may impact your overall user experience.

contact.title: Questions?
contact.content: If you have any questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at privacy@qianniuspace.com.

consent.message: We use cookies to improve your experience and analyze site traffic. By continuing to use our site, you agree to our cookie policy.
